Rion (finally!)

Rion struggled weakly beneath Diana. She always won! He was the one who had 
all the classes and had actually trained for this! Why did she always beat 
him so easily?! Rion tried to roll over, but just ended up with his wing in 
a very uncomfortable position:

"C'mon! You cheated!"

Rion tried to scowl, but couldn't help laughing when Diana wiggled her toes 
against his chest. He was ticklish and she knew it! Finally she allowed him 
to get to his feet, well, first he wanted to sit there and look really 
sullen cause he lost. He toyed with the sand a bit before looking up at 
Diana:

"How'd ya do that?"
